title: Disempowered: A Novel Based On A True Story
description: In June ‘2003, Pam, a social worker goes to federal prison. She is convicted of health care fraud and laundering in a small business.  Devastated by the trauma of going from middle-class comfort to living with numerous women behind walls, she begins searching for understanding and truth.  She finds herself in another world, where sex between women, fighting and lovers dominate…During the incarceration, she makes three new friends. Nega, the wife of a dentist−becomes her closest confidant.  Now Pam and her friends must each face her own personal struggles and temptations within the federal penitentiary of hell. Then she stumbles across a shocking secret about her case.
author: Pamela Beasley
